original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3296)@</color>在武器上匯聚雷電之力，在一口氣轟擊面前的區域，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3296)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成三次物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3296)@</color> gather the power of thunder and lightning on the weapon, bombard the area in front of you in one breath, and use <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3296)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts three physical damage to the enemy.
